title: Hintapp
description:
Prepare your speech in advance! Hintapp will help you create perfect note cards (cue cards).
>Large contrast font makes it easy to read text from a distance
>Edit cards in iPhone/iPad
>Apple Watch support
>Easy gesture control
>Minimalistic design
>iCloud storage support
>Timer to help you keep track of time
>Colour cards
-You can enable web links & text selection in presentation mode
